titleStmt.title: The knave in graine, new vampt A witty comedy, acted at at the Fortune many dayes together with great applause. Written by J.D. Gent.
titleStmt.author: J. D., Gent.
Day, John, 1574-1640?, attributed name.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by I[ohn] O[kes] and are to be sold by Iohn Nicholson at his shop under St. Martins Church neare Ludgate,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.

place.placeName: his shop under St. Martins Church neare Ludgate
